body.p: I certify W. W Hester personally appeared before me this day and took oath Required by Law as 1st Lieutenant in Regiment of Kentucky Volunteer Malitia to be mustered into the Service of the United States

Douglas Little
presiding Judge for McLean County Kentucky

McLean CoOaths of Sundry Officers
Decr 6. 1861
